thread.title: European stocks open mixed
thread.title_full: European stocks open mixed | Business Spectator

author: AFP
title: European stocks open mixed
text:
Europe's main stock markets have opened steadier after sharp losses the previous session.
London's benchmark FTSE 100 index gained 0.37 per cent to 5,957.77 points compared with Tuesday's close.
In the eurozone, Frankfurt's DAX 30 added 0.20 per cent to 9,589.70 points and the Paris CAC 40 edged down 0.02 per cent to 4,427.79.
European indices had tumbled on Tuesday, dragged down by sharp losses to shares prices of carmakers and miners on the Volkswagen scandal and a bleak outlook for China's economy, dealers said.
Volkswagen shares were down around eight per cent in early trading on Wednesday.
